reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, appreciating that it doesn't scratch or itch, with one noting it's perfect for Minnesota winters.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice sweater
items.body: Warm and very true to size. I am 5’10” and 145lbs and a medium fit me nicely. The sweater is soft and very comfortable. I ordered the dark blue and got many compliments Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit. True to size
items.body: Beautiful jumper love the color. Not too expensive either heavy but warm enough. Great quality and length covers the back side. Read more
items.author: Gypsywoman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit and feel
items.body: Fit perfect and is really comfortable Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New fav winter sweater!
items.body: So soft, stretchy, comfy!!! Easily dressed up and down for effortless style! The quality is great, it’s thick and warm without being too thick and warm! It’s the perfect cozy sweater! Read more
items.author: Katie Mellon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater!
items.body: The color is so pretty! It fits true to size and is very soft! Read more
items.author: Jenny

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very good but warm
items.body: Odd fabric that doesn't un-wrinkle as comfortable and pretty, it's not quality. It has discoloration after washing and it's going to be a casual instead of work sweater. Read more
items.author: Pamchi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm wash and med heat dry, to shrink.
items.body: Mock turtle neck. Size M arrived looking too large, wrinkled, and sorta thin feeling. Washed it in warm water and tumbled dry on high. It shrank and the texture firmed up to a perfect M. Comfortable, versatile, and good value. The med blue looks great w jeans. I ordered another one in apricot. Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: This is my new favorite sweater! Soft, good size, warm but not stuffy, and just cute! Definitely a good piece for a winter wardrobe. Just add your accessories and you’re styled well. It didn’t shrink in the wash (cold) and I just hang dry it. Read more
items.author: Tiffany Antrich

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Royalblue, Apricot, Black, Sage, Coffee, Dustyblue, Lightbrown, Oatmeal, Peagreen, Armygreen, Navy, Plum. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
